Package edu.cnm.deepdive.picturequest

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AutoFitTextureView  
    CameraFragment
    Fragment class that utilizes the Camera2 Api, lovingly borrowed from GoogleSampleCode.
    CameraFragment.ConfirmationDialog
    Shows OK/Cancel confirmation dialog about camera permission.
    CameraFragment.ErrorDialog
    Shows an error message dialog.
    ChoiceFragment
    Fragment class that is navigated to through the MainActivity the purpose of this Fragment is to display Buttons that have the associated Choice to continue the Story of the game then upon clicking a Button navigate you to the SceneFragment with the next Scene displayed.
    LoginActivity
    Initial Activity to have a person login using GoogleSignInService If someone is already signed in it will load the MainActivity with a Player already associated to the sign in and set the Scene to the last place they left the activity at.
    MainActivity
    Main Activity for the class, containing the onCreate class, and calls a MainViewModel.
    PictureQuestApplication
    Application class to create, Initialize Stetho and do a empty delete of on the RoomDatabase to initialize the database upon app creation, and finally initialize the GoogleSignInService
    SceneFragment
    Fragment class that holds a ListView of the current Scene displayed to the user to play through the game.
